Method Detail

addItem

public void addItem(ObjectZork item,
                    zorkPackage.Room room1)
Method for adding an item to your inventory. Params are the item you wish to pick up and the room your currently in. First it checks to see if you reached you max space in the inventory, if not it checks to see what item you wish to pick up and if your in the correct room to pick it up in, once you add an item is bumps up the spaceCount by one.

Parameters:
item -
room1 -

dropItem

public void dropItem(ObjectZork item)
Method for removing items from your inventory. First checks to see if you have the item, and if you do it removes it from your inventory, If you don't it prints out a statement.

Parameters:
item -

Use

public void Use(ObjectZork item,

Use method for using objects, Takes the item you want to use and depending on the item gives an effect.
